Title: Requires the commissioner of education to make recommendations to the board of regents relating to the adoption of instruction in climate science in senior high schools
Summary: Requires the commissioner of education to make recommendations to the board of regents relating to the adoption of instruction in climate science in senior high schools.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of education to make recommendations to the board of regents relating to the adoption of instruction in climate science in senior high schools
